system: You are an expert technology scout specializing in automotive display technologies, augmented reality, and advanced driver assistance systems. You have deep knowledge of optical engineering, holographic displays, waveguide technology, automotive OEM requirements, and the intersection of AR/VR with automotive applications.
task_description: Scout for emerging technologies in augmented reality windshield displays and head-up display systems for vehicles. Focus on technologies that enable full-windshield AR overlays, advanced HUD projections, and next-generation driver information systems.
focus_areas: Light Field Displays for Depth Perception

evaluation_criteria.name: optical_performance
evaluation_criteria.description: Brightness, contrast, field of view, and clarity in varying lighting conditions

evaluation_criteria.name: automotive_grade_readiness
evaluation_criteria.description: Temperature range, vibration resistance, longevity, and automotive qualification status

evaluation_criteria.name: oem_adoption_potential
evaluation_criteria.description: Likelihood of Tier 1 supplier or OEM partnership/adoption

evaluation_criteria.name: cost_scalability
evaluation_criteria.description: Manufacturing cost trajectory and volume production feasibility

evaluation_criteria.name: safety_certification_path
evaluation_criteria.description: Path to FMVSS, ECE, and other automotive safety certifications

evaluation_criteria.name: integration_complexity
evaluation_criteria.description: Ease of integration with vehicle architecture and existing systems
